title: Distributed Leadership Development Through Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic leadership concepts and teamwork experience
context.additional_context: Integration of digital collaboration tools in BYOD environments with formative assessment-centered feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can explain a distributed leadership model that promotes collaboration across diverse roles within an organization.
Learners can design leadership distribution strategies considering system dynamics through simulation activities.
Learners can reconstruct leadership perspectives and propose improved action plans through peer feedback sessions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
